# Memnor
## Overview
Name: Memnor

Gender: m

Rank: Intermediate Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Evil Cloud Giants, Pride, Mental Prowess and Control

Titles:

Holy Symbol: Thin black obelisk

Alignment: NE

Origin of Worship: Giant

Core Worshippers: Evil Cloud Giants

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Morningstar

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: *+1 mighty cleaving morningstar*

Domains: Death, Domination\* (CD), Evil, Mind\* (CD), Sky\* (RotW), Trickery.

Special Notes:
